assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: DNA samples analysed were collected during the DevelopAKUre project (was approved by Independent ethics committees at each study center), or during routine diagnostics. No additional ethical approval was required.
